about_the_game:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

The protagonist of Masquerade Kiss is a capable secret agent with a powerful sense of justice. She seeks to expose the nefarious deeds of "the worst man in the world," and so sneaks closer to him under an assumed alias.
However, the more she gets to know him, the stronger the pull of attraction gets. She's in danger of falling in love.
As this thrilling, spicy tale unfolds, she'll have to choose between the mission and her heart.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
My name, my job - it's all a lie.
But this love is real.

Who wins in the game of seduction? You're an elite agent tasked with taking down the most corrupt people in the world.
However, your latest target may be your most challenging yet. His hand slips into your dress, fingers dangerously close to the wire hidden in your lingerie...
"You think you can take me? Go ahead, try." You're playing a dangerous game now, one without winners...

Characters:
Kazuomi Shido "Dangerous, Bewitching Charms"
Yuzuru Shiba "Icy, Inimical Eyes & Bracingly Hot Lips"
Kei Soejima "The Sensual Demon Lurking Behind a Smile"
Boss "The Man You Admire"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until Season 2

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages, as well as the consumption of alcohol.
